short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generates a synthesizer soundscape from your twitter feed. Alpha Version

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome extension that works on top of TweetDeck, using your twitter feed and notifications as the source material for a synthesized soundscape. Even works while you're in another tab so you can listen for notifications and messages.

Still in Alpha.
